title: A surface-patterned chip as a strong source of ultracold atoms for quantum technologies
title_cn: 表面图案化的芯片可作为量子技术的超冷原子的强大来源
abstract: Laser-cooled atoms are central to modern precision measurements. They are also increasingly important as an enabling technology for experimental cavity quantum electrodynamics, quantum information processing and matter–wave interferometry. Although significant progress has been made in miniaturizing atomic metrological devices, these are limited in accuracy by their use of hot atomic ensembles and buffer gases. Advances have also been made in producing portable apparatus that benefits from the advantages of atoms in the microkelvin regime. However, simplifying atomic cooling and loading using microfabrication technology has proved difficult. In this Letter we address this problem, realizing an atom chip that enables the integration of laser cooling and trapping into a compact apparatus. Our source delivers ten thousand times more atoms than previous magneto-optical traps with microfabricated optics and, for the first time, can reach sub-Doppler temperatures. Moreover, the same chip design offers a simple way to form stable optical lattices. These features, combined with simplicity of fabrication and ease of operation, make these new traps a key advance in the development of cold-atom technology for high-accuracy, portable measurement devices.
abstract_cn: 激光冷却的原子是现代精密测量的核心。作为实验型腔量子电动力学，量子信息处理和物质波干涉测量技术的一种使能技术，它们也越来越重要。尽管在使原子计量装置小型化方面取得了重大进展，但由于使用热原子团和缓冲气体，这些装置的准确性受到限制。受益于微开尔文体系中原子的优势，在生产便携式设备方面也取得了进展。但是，事实证明，使用微细加工技术简化原子冷却和负载很困难。在这封信中，我们解决了这个问题，实现了一种原子芯片，该芯片能够将激光冷却和捕集集成到紧凑的设备中。我们的源提供的原子比以前使用微制造光学器件的磁光阱多一万倍，并且首次可以达到亚多普勒温度。而且，相同的芯片设计提供了一种形成稳定光学晶格的简单方法。这些功能加上简单的制造和易于操作的特性，使得这些新型阱成为用于高精度便携式测量设备的冷原子技术发展的关键进展。

title: Direct observation and dynamics of spontaneous skyrmion-like magnetic domains in a ferromagnet
title_cn: 铁磁体中自发天rm子样磁畴的直接观察和动力学
abstract: The structure and dynamics of submicrometre magnetic domains are the main factors determining the physical properties of magnetic materials. Here, we report the first observation of skyrmion-like magnetic nanodomains in a ferromagnetic manganite, La0.5Ba0.5MnO3, using Lorentz transmission electron microscopy (LTEM). The skyrmion-like magnetic domains appear as clusters above the Curie temperature. We found that the repeated reversal of magnetic chirality is caused by thermal fluctuation. The closely spaced clusters exhibit dynamic coupling, and the repeated magnetization reversal becomes fully synchronized with the same chirality. Quantitative analysis of such dynamics was performed by LTEM to directly determine the barrier energy for the magnetization reversal of skyrmion-like nanometre domains. This study is expected to pave the way for further investigation of the unresolved nature and dynamics of magnetic vortex-like nanodomains.
abstract_cn: 亚微米级磁畴的结构和动力学是决定磁性材料物理特性的主要因素。 在这里，我们报告了使用洛伦兹透射电子对铁磁锰矿中La 0.5 Ba 0.5 MnO 3 的铁磁状磁纳米域的首次观察 显微镜（LTEM）。 像天rm子一样的磁畴在居里温度以上以簇的形式出现。 我们发现，磁性手性的反复逆转是由热波动引起的。 紧密排列的簇表现出动态耦合，并且重复的磁化反转在相同的手性下变得完全同步。 通过LTEM对此类动力学进行了定量分析，以直接确定用于像天敌般的纳米域磁化反转的势垒能。 该研究有望为进一步研究磁旋状纳米域的未解决性质和动力学铺平道路。

title: A nanoscale combing technique for the large-scale assembly of highly aligned nanowires
title_cn: 用于大规模组装高度对齐的纳米线的纳米级梳理技术
abstract: The controlled assembly of nanowires is a key challenge in the development of a range of bottom-up devices. Recent advances in the post-growth assembly of nanowires and carbon nanotubes have led to alignment ratios of 80–95% for a misalignment angle of ±5° (refs ) and allowed various multiwire devices to be fabricated. However, these methods still create a significant number of crossing defects, which restricts the development of device arrays and circuits based on single nanowires/nanotubes. Here, we show that a nanocombing assembly technique, in which nanowires are anchored to defined areas of a surface and then drawn out over chemically distinct regions of the surface, can yield arrays with greater than 98.5% of the nanowires aligned to within ±1° of the combing direction. The arrays have a crossing defect density of ∼0.04 nanowires per µm and efficient end registration at the anchoring/combing interface. With this technique, arrays of single-nanowire devices are tiled over chips and shown to have reproducible electronic properties. We also show that nanocombing can be used for laterally deterministic assembly, to align ultralong (millimetre-scale) nanowires to within ±1° and to assemble suspended and crossed nanowire arrays.
abstract_cn: 纳米线的受控组装是一系列自下而上的器件开发中的关键挑战。纳米线和碳纳米管的生长后组装的最新进展已导致80％的对准比和95％的未对准角。 （参考文献），并允许制造各种多线设备。然而，这些方法仍然产生大量交叉缺陷，这限制了基于单纳米线/纳米管的器件阵列和电路的开发。在这里，我们显示了一种纳米梳组装技术，其中将纳米线锚定到表面的定义区域，然后将其拉出表面的化学上不同的区域，可以产生大于98.5％的纳米线排列在＆＃177内的阵列; 1＆＃176;梳理方向。阵列具有每μm≤0.04纳米线的交叉缺陷密度，并且在锚固/梳理界面处具有有效的末端配准。利用这种技术，单纳米线器件的阵列被平铺在芯片上，并显示出具有可复制的电子特性。我们还显示，纳米梳可用于横向确定性装配，以将超长（毫米级）纳米线对准到＆＃177; 1＆＃176;内。并组装悬浮和交叉的纳米线阵列。

title: A biomimetic nanosponge that absorbs pore-forming toxins
title_cn: 吸收孔形成毒素的仿生纳米海绵
abstract: Detoxification treatments such as toxin-targeted anti-virulence therapy offer ways to cleanse the body of virulence factors that are caused by bacterial infections, venomous injuries and biological weaponry. Because existing detoxification platforms such as antisera, monoclonal antibodies, small-molecule inhibitors and molecularly imprinted polymers act by targeting the molecular structures of toxins, customized treatments are required for different diseases. Here, we show a biomimetic toxin nanosponge that functions as a toxin decoy in vivo. The nanosponge, which consists of a polymeric nanoparticle core surrounded by red blood cell membranes, absorbs membrane-damaging toxins and diverts them away from their cellular targets. In a mouse model, the nanosponges markedly reduce the toxicity of staphylococcal alpha-haemolysin (α-toxin) and thus improve the survival rate of toxin-challenged mice. This biologically inspired toxin nanosponge presents a detoxification treatment that can potentially treat a variety of injuries and diseases caused by pore-forming toxins.
abstract_cn: 排毒治疗（例如以毒素为目标的抗毒力疗法）提供了清除体内由细菌感染，毒伤和生物武器引起的毒力因子的方法。由于现有的排毒平台（例如抗血清，单克隆抗体，小分子抑制剂和分子印迹聚合物）通过靶向毒素的分子结构起作用，因此需要针对不同疾病进行定制治疗。在这里，我们展示了一种仿生毒素纳米海绵，可在体内充当毒素诱饵。纳米海绵由被红细胞膜包围的聚合物纳米颗粒核心组成，吸收破坏膜的毒素并将其从细胞靶标转移开。在小鼠模型中，纳米海绵显着降低了葡萄球菌α-溶血素（毒素）的毒性，从而提高了毒素激发小鼠的存活率。这种受生物启发的毒素纳米海绵提供了一种排毒疗法，可以潜在地治疗由成孔毒素引起的多种伤害和疾病。

title: Dynamic switching of the spin circulation in tapered magnetic nanodisks
title_cn: 锥形磁性纳米盘中自旋循环的动态切换
abstract: Magnetic vortices are characterized by the sense of in-plane magnetization circulation and by the polarity of the vortex core. With each having two possible states, there are four possible stable magnetization configurations that can be utilized for a multibit memory cell. Dynamic control of vortex core polarity has been demonstrated using both alternating and pulsed magnetic fields and currents. Here, we show controlled dynamic switching of spin circulation in vortices using nanosecond field pulses by imaging the process with full-field soft X-ray transmission microscopy. The dynamic reversal process is controlled by far-from-equilibrium gyrotropic precession of the vortex core, and the reversal is achieved at significantly reduced field amplitudes when compared with static switching. We further show that both the field pulse amplitude and duration required for efficient circulation reversal can be controlled by appropriate selection of the disk geometry.
abstract_cn: 磁涡流的特征在于面内磁化循环感和涡流核的极性。 每种状态都有两种可能的状态，因此有四种可能的稳定磁化配置可用于多位存储单元。 涡流磁芯极性的动态控制已经使用交变磁场和脉冲磁场以及电流进行了证明。 在这里，我们通过使用全场软X射线透射显微镜对过程进行成像，显示了使用纳秒场脉冲在旋涡中控制自旋循环的动态切换。 动态逆转过程由涡流核的非平衡回旋进动控制，并且与静态切换相比，在大幅减小的场振幅下实现了逆转。 进一步的研究表明 既 高效 循环 反转所需 的 场脉冲 的幅度和 持续时间可以 由盘 的几何形状 的 适当的 选择来控制 。

title: Using nanoscale thermocapillary flows to create arrays of purely semiconducting single-walled carbon nanotubes
title_cn: 使用纳米级热毛细管流创建纯半导体单壁碳纳米管阵列
abstract: Among the remarkable variety of semiconducting nanomaterials that have been discovered over the past two decades, single-walled carbon nanotubes remain uniquely well suited for applications in high-performance electronics, sensors and other technologies. The most advanced opportunities demand the ability to form perfectly aligned, horizontal arrays of purely semiconducting, chemically pristine carbon nanotubes. Here, we present strategies that offer this capability. Nanoscale thermocapillary flows in thin-film organic coatings followed by reactive ion etching serve as highly efficient means for selectively removing metallic carbon nanotubes from electronically heterogeneous aligned arrays grown on quartz substrates. The low temperatures and unusual physics associated with this process enable robust, scalable operation, with clear potential for practical use. We carry out detailed experimental and theoretical studies to reveal all of the essential attributes of the underlying thermophysical phenomena. We demonstrate use of the purified arrays in transistors that achieve mobilities exceeding 1,000 cm2 V−1 s−1 and on/off switching ratios of ∼10,000 with current outputs in the milliamp range. Simple logic gates built using such devices represent the first steps toward integration into more complex circuits.
abstract_cn: 在过去二十年中发现的各种半导体纳米材料中，单壁碳纳米管仍然非常适合高性能电子，传感器和其他技术领域的应用。最先进的机会要求能够形成纯半导体化学纯碳纳米管的完美排列的水平阵列。在这里，我们介绍提供此功能的策略。纳米级的热毛细管在薄膜有机涂层中流动，然后进行反应性离子刻蚀，是从生长在石英基板上的电子异质排列阵列中选择性去除金属碳纳米管的高效手段。与该过程相关的低温和异常物理特性使得其运行稳定，可扩展，并具有明显的实际应用潜力。我们进行了详细的实验和理论研究，以揭示潜在的热物理现象的所有基本属性。我们展示了在迁移率超过1,000＆＃160; cm 2 ＆＃160; V ＆＃8722; 1 ＆＃160; s < sup>＆＃8722; 1 和10,000的开/关切换比，电流输出在毫安范围内。使用此类器件构建的简单逻辑门代表了集成到更复杂电路中的第一步。

title: A general method for transferring graphene onto soft surfaces
title_cn: 将石墨烯转移到软表面上的一般方法
abstract: Recent advances in chemical vapour deposition have led to the fabrication of large graphene sheets on metal foils for use in research and development. However, further breakthroughs are required in the way these graphenes are transferred from their growth substrates onto the final substrate. Although various methods have been developed, as yet there is no general way to reliably transfer graphene onto arbitrary surfaces, such as ‘soft’ ones. Here, we report a method that allows the graphene to be transferred with high fidelity at the desired location on almost all surfaces, including fragile polymer thin films and hydrophobic surfaces. The method relies on a sacrificial ‘self-releasing’ polymer layer placed between a conventional polydimethylsiloxane elastomer stamp and the graphene that is to be transferred. This self-releasing layer provides a low work of adhesion on the stamp, which facilitates delamination of the graphene and its placement on the new substrate. To demonstrate the generality and reliability of our method, we fabricate high field-strength polymer capacitors using graphene as the top contact over a polymer dielectric thin film. These capacitors show superior dielectric breakdown characteristics compared with those made with evaporated metal top contacts. Furthermore, we fabricate low-operation-voltage organic field-effect transistors using graphene as the gate electrode placed over a thin polymer gate dielectric layer. We finally demonstrate an artificial graphite intercalation compound by stacking alternate monolayers of graphene and 2,3,5,6-tetrafluoro-7,7,8,8-tetracyanoquinodimethane (F4TCNQ). This compound, which comprises graphene sheets p-doped by partial hole transfer from the F4TCNQ, shows a high and remarkably stable hole conductivity, even when heated in the presence of moisture.
abstract_cn: 化学气相沉积的最新进展已导致在用于研究和开发的金属箔上制造大型石墨烯片。但是，这些石墨烯从其生长基质转移到最终基质上的方式还需要进一步突破。尽管已经开发了各种方法，但是还没有将石墨烯可靠地转移到任意表面上的通用方法，例如＆＃8216; soft＆＃8217;。那些。在这里，我们报告了一种方法，该方法可以在几乎所有表面（包括易碎的聚合物薄膜和疏水性表面）上的所需位置高保真度地转移石墨烯。该方法依赖于牺牲性的“自我释放”。放置在常规聚二甲基硅氧烷弹性体印模和要转移的石墨烯之间的聚合物层。这种自释放层在印模上的粘合力较低，这有助于石墨烯分层及其在新基材上的放置。为了证明我们方法的通用性和可靠性，我们使用石墨烯作为聚合物电介质薄膜上的顶部触点来制造高场强聚合物电容器。与使用蒸发金属顶部触点制成的电容器相比，这些电容器具有优异的介电击穿特性。此外，我们使用石墨烯作为栅电极，在薄的聚合物栅介质层上方制作了低工作电压有机场效应晶体管。我们最后通过堆叠交替的石墨烯单层和2,3,5,6-四氟-7,7,8,8-四氰基喹二甲烷（F 4 TCNQ）展示了一种人造石墨插层化合物。这种化合物包含通过从F 4 TCNQ进行部分空穴转移而被p掺杂的石墨烯片，即使在有湿气的情况下加热，它也具有很高且非常稳定的空穴传导性。

title: In vivo magnetic resonance imaging of hyperpolarized silicon particles
title_cn: 超极化硅颗粒的体内磁共振成像
abstract: Silicon-based micro- and nanoparticles have gained popularity in a wide range of biomedical applications due to their biocompatibility and biodegradability in vivo, as well as their flexible surface chemistry, which allows drug loading, functionalization and targeting. Here, we report direct in vivo imaging of hyperpolarized 29Si nuclei in silicon particles by magnetic resonance imaging. Natural physical properties of silicon provide surface electronic states for dynamic nuclear polarization, extremely long depolarization times, insensitivity to the in vivo environment or particle tumbling, and surfaces favourable for functionalization. Potential applications to gastrointestinal, intravascular and tumour perfusion imaging at subpicomolar concentrations are presented. These results demonstrate a new background-free imaging modality applicable to a range of inexpensive, readily available and biocompatible silicon particles.
abstract_cn: 基于硅的微颗粒和纳米颗粒由于其在体内的生物相容性和生物降解性以及灵活的表面化学特性（可实现药物装载，功能化和靶向作用）而在广泛的生物医学应用中获得普及。 在这里，我们报道了通过磁共振成像对硅粒子中的超极化 29 Si核进行的直接体内成像。 硅的自然物理性质为动态核极化，极长的去极化时间，对体内环境的不敏感性或颗粒的滚动提供了表面电子状态，并为功能化提供了有利的表面。 介绍了亚皮摩尔浓度下胃肠道，血管内和肿瘤灌注成像的潜在应用。 这些结果证明了一种新的无背景成像方式，适用于一系列廉价，易于获得且生物相容的硅颗粒。

title: A magneto-DNA nanoparticle system for rapid detection and phenotyping of bacteria
title_cn: 磁性DNA纳米粒子系统，用于细菌的快速检测和表型鉴定
abstract: So far, although various diagnostic approaches for pathogen detection have been proposed, most are too expensive, lengthy or limited in specificity for clinical use. Nanoparticle systems with unique material properties, however, circumvent these problems and offer improved accuracy over current methods. Here, we present novel magneto-DNA probes capable of rapid and specific profiling of pathogens directly in clinical samples. A nanoparticle hybridization assay, involving ubiquitous and specific probes that target bacterial 16S rRNAs, was designed to detect amplified target DNAs using a miniaturized NMR device. Ultimately, the magneto-DNA platform will allow both universal and specific detection of various clinically relevant bacterial species, with sensitivity down to single bacteria. Furthermore, the assay is robust and rapid, simultaneously diagnosing a panel of 13 bacterial species in clinical specimens within 2 h. The generic platform described could be used to rapidly identify and phenotype pathogens for a variety of applications.
abstract_cn: 迄今为止，尽管已经提出了用于病原体检测的各种诊断方法，但是大多数方法对于临床使用而言过于昂贵，冗长或特异性有限。然而，具有独特材料特性的纳米粒子系统可避免这些问题，并提供比当前方法更高的准确性。在这里，我们提出了新颖的磁性DNA探针，能够直接在临床样品中快速，特异地分析病原体。设计了一种纳米颗粒杂交测定法，涉及使用靶向细菌16S rRNA的普遍存在的特异性探针，以使用小型NMR设备检测扩增的目标DNA。最终，magneto-DNA平台将允许对各种临床相关细菌种类进行通用和特异性检测，并且灵敏度低至单个细菌。此外，该检测方法功能强大且快速，可在2小时内同时诊断临床标本中的13种细菌。所描述的通用平台可用于快速识别病原体并将其表型化，以用于各种应用。</ p>
